content.name: Runner «P06-00-0001»
content.description:
The runner is destined for installation on the «P-5» current collectors of the «VL 10» series electric locomotives and «TA 09-SET 160 3200» current collectors of the «2ES6» series electric locomotives.

This runner has the ability to adjust the horn-bevels.

The total length is 2040 mm, the diameter of the holes for attachment to the current collector carriage is 12 mm, the number of rows of metal-ceramic plates is 3, mounted according to the 3 + 2 + 3 scheme, the weight of the carcass with 8 metal-ceramic plates on an iron base is 12.2 kg.
